name: Little Unit, Big Map
description:
Little Unit, Big Map is a gorgeously dark & stylish adventure. Control a tiny weak unit who isn't in much combat directly, yet there is plenty of action.

The factions are the reward of this map. You get to be part of a sophisticated & well designed faction but after you complete their grand quest.

Plus a balanced, intense final boss fight, plenty of platforming & dreary land wandering.

Main characters:

- Little Unit, weak ultimate explorer & treasure hunter 
- Elder, leader Temple of Eons, wise summoner 
- Old Lord Calypso, leader of Luster, speaks ancient tongue 
- Egg Keeper, creepy ally 
- Tyrant, demi-god of destruction 
- Adrige, leader of Science Faction, his inventions are masterful 

<!-- -->



Places:

- Temple of Eons, ancient and dark, timeless feel. Game starts on Elder's Tower. 
- Science Faction, quirky grinding gears, massive pipes & anything to do with science. 
- Luster, complexly layered old-world insectoid city. 
- Star's Plenty, floating utopia, main city. 
- Twisted Dimension, a mind-bending twisted ancient mega-structure. 
- Desert of Despair, an enthralling maze of sand 
- Volcano, a fully working volcano, sealed by an ancient gate, in the volcanic core is none another than Pandora's Box! 

<!-- -->



Development:

- complete 

<!-- -->

Notes:

- most file size is from terrain
